analyzed: sngags 'das dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: t'i ni spyi bo du'o //

original: phyag bzhi pa /

analyzed: phyag dang po na zhags pa /
translated: In her first hand she holds a noose.

original: gnyis pa na dung /
analyzed: gnyis pa na dung /

translated: Likewise, she holds an utpala and a goad in her hands.

analyzed: dpag tshad stong las kyang dgug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even from a thousand leagues away, she will summon.

analyzed: 'bum bzlas pas gang 'dod pa de ster zhing dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: By reciting the mantra one hundred thousand times, she will grant whatever one desires and will be under one’s control.

original: yang na lcags kyu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang na lcags kyu dgod par bya'o //

original: kha dog nag por bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog nag por bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i cho ga rdzogs so /
